data.name: Void Arena
data.detailed_description:
Void Arena is a Fantasy FPS which features an elegant ARPG combat system in the place of gunplay. Skills and classes traditionally played from the isometric perspective are thrilling to experience in first person. Wield magic and steel against your enemies in single and multiplayer action.



INFINITE RIFT


  • Endless Wave Mode
  • Defeat endless waves and unlock power ups as you explore hand crafted maps
  • Gain new skills & level up characters

STORY MODE

(not yet available)

  • Single Player and COOP adventure mode
  • 4 Act Story
  • Gain new skills & level up characters

ARENA


  • Free for all & Team Multiplayer
  • Game modes include: Kill the Man with the Ball, Capture the point, Deathmatch
  • Gain new skills & level up characters

Void Arena is a passion project of a single developer who sometimes gets help from friends. If you decide to purchase the game please provide as much feedback as you can via the forums. Wishlists help as well! =)

data.short_description: Void Arena is a Fantasy FPS which features an elegant ARPG combat system in the place of gunplay. Skills and classes traditionally played from the isometric perspective are thrilling to experience in first person.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Pentium Celeron
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 10XX
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
